personalInfo.name: Oscasavia Birungi
personalInfo.title: Software Engineer
personalInfo.bio: Passionate software engineer with expertise in building scalable web applications and solving complex problems. I enjoy working with modern technologies and collaborating in agile environments. Continuously learning and seeking new challenges.

projects.title: FavorRequest
projects.description: FavorRequest is a dynamic peer-to-peer favor exchange platform where users can post, browse, and fulfill favor-based tasks.

projects.title: Savia Job Consultants
projects.description: Savia Job Consultants is a static web application for viewing available job posts in Uganda.

projects.title: Clarifin
projects.description: Clarifin is an android mobile application that enables users with planning and tracking their personal financial goals.

projects.title: Wimbli
projects.description: Wimbli is a cross-platform mobile app built with React Native and Firebase, focused on helping users discover hyper-local, spontaneous experiences and real-world connections
